file_content.text: Greetings! Who are you, and what have you done to earn jail time?
Speculation: Evil, no doubt.
Many terrible things, I suspect.
Only to those who dare defy the Eternal Empire.
In other words, everyone else in the galaxy.
Hypothesis: A bad temper?
Judging by her expression, perhaps she required an attitude adjustment.
Assertion: She is an enemy.
She is an Exarch of Zakuul, an enhanced warrior prone to zealotry, oppression, and self-righteousness.
If you had a tongue, I would tear it out for your insolence.
Strong words from a meatbag in a box.
I know who you serve, droid. You came to take my head.
Don't flatter yourself. Your head isn't that nice.
What are you?
Did you see what I did? We can be twins!
Encouragement: Very close.
You didn't call her "meatbag," but the resemblance was uncanny.
Query: Is that really me?
Is that what my voice sounds like?
Demand: Stop that.
No, we cannot. I am an only droid.
I'm a lump with a bad attitude! Honor! Misplaced hostility! Grr!
You dare mock me?
I'm a Replicator unit, HK! I can impersonate anyone I've met! Isn't that fun?
Approval: I like this new you.
A feature applicable to subterfuge and comedic effect. I approve.
Lament: This will be tiresome.
I predict many future annoyances.
Idea: Time for a reset.
Request: Hold still.
What are you doing?
Wait for it...
Greetings! I am Zeeyo Ohm, activating for the first time. My function is... unknown!
That's better.
Enough. The base is full of guards. You will need my help to escape.
I detect heavily armed organics at the turbolift.
I have not killed a foe in months. My blood burns for it. Release me, and I will fight by your side.
Concession: I'll release you.
I am tempted to use your cell's disintegrator... but you're more useful alive.
I am ready to bathe in the blood of our common foe.
After you, Exarch.
Solution: Killing is easier.
A tempting offer. Unfortunately for you, this is more tempting: your cell's disintegrator.
No, wait!
She wanted to help us, but you converted her to a gas!
One of my finest moments. If only Master could see me now...
You're the most interesting droid I've ever met.
This button fires a disintegrator in your cell. Don't make me regret I was programmed to avoid it.
There is nothing about you worth saving, but my master's protocols are strict regarding unarmed enemies.
You speak to an Exarch of Zakuul. Know your place.
You prove my point masterfully.
I have no idea what that means, but you're interesting!
I prefer to bathe in oil. Better for my joints.
